Title: Prohibits insurance carriers and employers from withholding certain benefits from injured workers based on attachment to the labor market
Summary: Prohibits insurance carriers and employers from withholding certain benefits from injured workers based on a claim that such workers have voluntarily withdrawn from the labor market by not seeking alternate employment that their injury or illness does not preclude them from performing.
LawCode: Amd ยง15, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to prohibiting insurance carriers and employers from withholding certain benefits from injured workers based on attachment to the labor market
